message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. It's a great deal considering its value to you is $10000. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm thinking of selling the product to you for $13500. It's a fair compromise, don't you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $13500 is still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to meet you at $12500. Would you be willing to sell it to me at that price?

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell it to you for $14000. That's as low as I can go, considering its value to me is higher than that. What do you think?
